channel.title: Project-Exile - "Made For Your Enjoyment"
channel.description:
[CENTER][URL=http://www.project-exile.com][IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/ExileBanner.gif[/img][/URL]
[IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/icon_homepage.png[/img] [B]Website:[/B] [url=http://www.project-exile.com]Click Here.[/url] [IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/play.gif[/img][B] Webclient:[/B] [url=http://project-exile.com/forums/index.php?page=web]Click Here.[/url] [IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/play.gif[/img][B]Download Client:[/B] [url=http://www.project-exile.com/play/Desktop Client.jar]Click Here.[/url] [URL=http://project-exile.com/forums/index.php?page=web] [IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/playnow.png[/img][/URL] [/CENTER]
[U][B]Server Features:[/B][/U]
[*]100% Uptime. [*]Core re-work for great server stability. [*]Friendly and active community. [*]Perfect item switches for amazing hybridding. [*]Fullscreen, Resizable and fixed screen size settings. [*]Perfect combat formulas almost identical to Rs. [*]100% Hitmarks and critical hits. [*]9 Different user rank crowns. [*]A unique Donator zone with many Donator benefits. [*]All skills fully working and being worked on every day. [*]Daily server and website updates. [*]A hard working owner who listens to his players. [*]Pk Points for killing players and Voting Points both with amazing reward shops. [*]Many bosses to defeat! [*]Fully working Grand Exchange. [*]Fully working clan chat with settings, crowns, kicking and more. [*]The server is hosted on a powerful VPS which is ran 24/7 for 100% uptime. [*]And many, many more features join today to see them for your self!
[CENTER][B][U]Media:[/U][/B][/CENTER]
[CENTER] [B][IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/Advertisement%20Thread%20Pictures/Picture2_zps083f5c01.png[/img] Custom login screen
[IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/50players.png[/img] Our old player base
[IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/Advertisement%20Thread%20Pictures/Picture6_zps7e1026e6.png[/img] Transforming Rock crabs and high detail maps
[IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/Advertisement%20Thread%20Pictures/Picture4_zpsa5e21fbc.png[/img] A preview of the Summoning skill and other features
[IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/Advertisement%20Thread%20Pictures/Picture7_zpse1e785ec.png[/img] Fully working Woodcutting and inferno adze
[IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/Advertisement%20Thread%20Pictures/Picture9_zps4d3e9ecf.png[/img] 100% Clan chat system - Supports kicking, ranks, crowns, options, updates take 60 seconds and more
[IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/Advertisement%20Thread%20Pictures/Picture5_zps94af619a.png[/img] A little preview of the Donator zone and also 100% quick prayers
[IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/Advertisement%20Thread%20Pictures/Picture1_zpsec1f60be.png[/img] All screen size settings which are also webclient compatible!
[IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/Advertisement%20Thread%20Pictures/Picture8_zpsce1fc2a4.png[/img] Fully working pest control
[IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/Advertisement%20Thread%20Pictures/Picture10_zps44ff74ce.png[/img] Working Dwarf multi cannon and Dagannoth kings
[IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/gepicture.png[/img] 100% Grand Exchange - Coming soon
[IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/Advertisement%20Thread%20Pictures/Picture3_zps0e2876db.png[/img] All needed global NPC spawns added
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/110125079/crowns.png[/img] 9 Unique ranks, with their own crown and commands [/B] [/CENTER]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jPC6uVz5ekI]Project-Exile switches - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wqi2bq5y-GQ]Clan chat - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=417Eo6zJ_Yc&feature=youtu.be&hd=1]Project-Exile Grand Exchange - YouTube[/url]
[B][U]Why should you choose to play Project-Exile over other servers?[/U][/B]
[*]A very good question.. But a very simple answer which is, Project-Exile cares about it's players, it cares about it's economy, it cares about how the server is ran and what the players suggest and what they want. We do everything we possible can to ensure that the players of Project-Exile enjoy playing the game and get the most friendly, fun and enjoyable game play they can!
[*]The server does frequent and daily updates almost every day, you can view all/most of the updates that happen on Project-Exile on the update-log on the forums. Project-Exile focuses on every players enjoyment, we have every aspect of game-play that we know players enjoy PvM, PvP, skilling, you name it we have it! We are not like other servers which are ignorant to there players and just ignores there opinions and even ignores there players when they talk to them.. I have played over 50 servers over the past 4 years and have watched very carefully how the best servers are ran and also how the bad servers are ran, I have learnt there mistakes and adapted to how the best servers are ran which is why Project-Exile is the place for you.

item.title: Project-Exile - "Made For Your Enjoyment"
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

It’s still the best server online atm in my opinion.

Staff and developers are now reworking on all skills.
Summoning is almost released. :eek:

Fixes and updates each 2 days.
Active staff.

(Summoning), hunter, construction and dungeoneering in the future! ;D

item.title: Project-Exile - "Made For Your Enjoyment"

item.description:
@Raw_Envy wrote:

[quote=“k2 k0, post:46, topic:474057”]This server is absolutely amazing The combat formula’s are amazing! Bossing is very nice nice exp rates Great switches for hybriding and great skilling and a great community of nice players! I really recommend joining this server as it will become #1 in no time!

  • Great Job Raw Envy and Tringan keep up the amazing work!

  • Leonidas[/quote]

Thanks man
